sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { _id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews } = tour const {totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return (
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating ===0 ?( 'not rated') :( ({reviews.length}) ) } ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price}/per person
) } export default TourCard
